query:
-- Add new fields to prioritization_criteria table
ALTER TABLE prioritization_criteria 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status ENUM('active','disabled','deleted') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS portfolioId INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deletedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS deletedBy INT NULL;

-- Add new fields to project_scores table
ALTER TABLE project_scores
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS companyId INT NULL;

-- Add index for project_scores
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_company_project_status ON project_scores (companyId, projectId, status);

-- Add new fields to criteria_audit_log table
ALTER TABLE criteria_audit_log
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS oldStatus ENUM('active','disabled','deleted') NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS newStatus ENUM('active','disabled','deleted') NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS impactedProjects INT DEFAULT 0;

-- Add new fields to project_scores table

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS companyId INT NULL;

-- Add index for project_scores

-- Add new fields to criteria_audit_log table
ALTER TABLE criteria_audit_log
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS oldStatus ENUM('active','disabled','deleted') NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS newStatus ENUM('active','disabled','deleted') NULL,
